languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s augurs scan an enemy ship to highlight its weak points.
All {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to a weak point is increased by +30%. Only one weak point can be highlighted at a time.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Авгуры сканируют вражеский корабль, чтобы найти его уязвимые места.
Весь урон, наносимый по уязвимым точкам, увеличивается на +30%. Единовременно может быть выделена только одна уязвимая точка.
<indent=5%>Восстановление: случайное, 1-3 раунда.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
The Flagship's augurs scan an enemy ship to highlight its weak points.
All damage dealt to a weak point is increased by +30%. Only one weak point can be highlighted at a time.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: 1-3 rounds at random.</indent>

The Flagship's augurs scan an enemy ship to highlight its weak points.
All damage dealt to a weak point is increased by +30%. Only one weak point can be highlighted at a time.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: 1-3 rounds at random.</indent>

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s augurs scan an enemy ship to highlight its weak points.
All {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to a weak point is increased by +30%. Only one weak point can be highlighted at a time.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

languages.text:
Авгуры сканируют вражеский корабль, чтобы найти его уязвимые места.
Весь {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урон{/g}, наносимый по уязвимым местам, увеличивается на +30%. Единовременно может быть выделено только одно уязвимое место.
<indent=5%>Восстановление: случайное, <u>(от 1 до 3)</u> раундов.</indent>

Die Auguren des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} scannen ein Feindschiff, um seine Schwachpunkte hervorzuheben.
Der gesamte {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} gegen einen Schwachpunkt wird um +30 % erhöht. Es kann jeweils nur eine Schwachstelle hervorgehoben werden.
<indent=5%>Abklingzeit: <u>(von 1 bis 3)</u> Runden nach dem Zufallsprinzip.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s augurs scan an enemy ship to highlight its weak points.
All {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to a weak point is increased by +30%. Only one weak point can be highlighted at a time.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Die Auguren des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} scannen ein Feindschiff, um seine Schwachpunkte hervorzuheben.
Der gesamte Schaden gegen einen Schwachpunkt wird um +30 % erhöht. Es kann jeweils nur eine Schwachstelle hervorgehoben werden.
<indent=5 %>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g}: zufällig 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
Les Augures du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} scannent un vaisseau ennemi pour mettre en évidence ses points faibles.
Tous les {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés aux points faibles augmentent de +30 %. Un seul point faible peut être mis en évidence à la fois.
<indent=5%>Délai de récupération : <u>(de 1 à 3)</u> rounds (aléatoire).</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s augurs scan an enemy ship to highlight its weak points.
All {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to a weak point is increased by +30%. Only one weak point can be highlighted at a time.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Les Augures du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} scannent un vaisseau ennemi pour mettre en évidence ses points faibles.
Tous les dégâts infligés aux points faibles augmentent de +30 %. Un seul point faible peut être mis en évidence à la fois.
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Délai de récupération{/g} : 1 à 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} (aléatoire).</indent>

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}使用俄歇矩阵扫描敌舰，寻找弱点。
对弱点进行的所有攻击，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会提高30%。
<indent=5%>冷却时间：随机<u>一到三轮</u>。</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s augurs scan an enemy ship to highlight its weak points.
All {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to a weak point is increased by +30%. Only one weak point can be highlighted at a time.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}使用俄歇矩阵扫描敌舰，寻找弱点。
对弱点进行的所有攻击，造成的伤害都会提高30%。每次扫描只能寻找一处弱点。
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}：随机一到三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。</indent>

languages.text:
Los augures de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} analizan una nave enemiga para buscar sus puntos débiles.
Todo {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} infligido a un punto débil aumenta un +30 %. Solo se puede resaltar un punto débil a la vez.
<indent=5%>Tiempo de recuperación: <u>(de 1 a 3)</u> asaltos aleatoriamente.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s augurs scan an enemy ship to highlight its weak points.
All {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to a weak point is increased by +30%. Only one weak point can be highlighted at a time.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Los augures de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} analizan una nave enemiga para buscar sus puntos débiles.
Todo daño infligido a un punto débil aumenta un +30 %. Solo se puede resaltar un punto débil a la vez.
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Tiempo de recuperación{/g}: 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}, aleatorio.</indent>

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}のスキャナーが敵艦の弱点をスキャンする。
弱点に対する全ての{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が30％増加する。一度にハイライトされる弱点は一箇所だけ。
<indent=5%>クールダウン：ランダムで<u>1～3</u>ラウンド。</indent>
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s augurs scan an enemy ship to highlight its weak points.
All {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to a weak point is increased by +30%. Only one weak point can be highlighted at a time.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}のスキャナーが敵艦の弱点をスキャンする。
弱点に与えられる全てのダメージは+30%増加する。一度にハイライトされる弱点は一箇所だけ。
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}：1-3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}（ランダム）</indent>
